member.param: string - cannot be longer than 7 characters
bool - specifies if 5% discount is applied

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the vehicle. Applies a 5% discount if the vehicle has the brobizz attribute.
